item.title: Paella Howto
item.description:
This document is based on the original recipe and pictures that I gave to my colleague Miguel Pérez Colino which he assembled in an internal company document and that he kindly translated for increased reach.

Ingredients

  • A bag of vegetables for paella (garrofón, Valencian white bean; ferraura y bajoqueta, Valencian green beans with pod)
  • Rice bomba 🛒#ad (7 handfuls)
  • Chicken and Rabbit (700 and 400 grams)
  • Grated tomato (The equivalent to 5 spoons)
  • Sweet Red Paprika Powder (Pimentón Rojo 🛒#ad)
  • Spanish Saffron 🛒#ad (300mg in threads) or E102 dye (small spoon just to the border)
  • Olive oil 🛒#ad to stir-fry (not much, so it doesn’t get oily)
  • Rosemary 🛒#ad
  • Salt
  • Water (from Valencia)

Preparation

A garlic clove, to be grated, must be peeled and put together with tomato. They must be kept together until they are stir-fried.
